36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Sahl bin Sa'd narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Whoever guarantees for me what is between his jaws and what is between his legs, I shall guarantee Paradise for him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي حِفْظِ اللِّسَانِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Protecting The Tongue
